text: Va ʙa afsune, ki devho ʙa ruzgori podsohii Sulajmon mexondand, pajravi kardand va Sulajmon kofir naʙud, vale devho, ki mardumro codugari meomuxtand, kofir ʙudand. Va niz on afsun, ki ʙar on du farista ---- Horut va Morut dar Boʙul nozil sud, dar hole, ki, on du ʙa har kas, ki codugari meomuxtand, meguftand: «Kori mo fitna ast, maʙod kofir savi». Va mardum az on du coduhe meomuxtand, ki metavonistand mijoni zanu suj cudoi afkanand va onon cuz ʙa farmoni Xudo ʙa kase zijone namerasonidand va on ci mardum meomuxtand, ʙa onho zijon merasonid, na sud. Va xud medonistand, ki xaridoroni on coduro dar oxirat ʙahrae nest. Xudro ʙa ʙad cize furuxtand, agar medonistand
